alert.note: Alert for Carlisle; Hickman (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:10PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Carlisle and Hickman Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 210 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Clinton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Clinton around 220 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Fulgham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
